summary.span: 表示要存放在資料庫中或從資料庫擷取的固定有效位數及小數位數值，介於 -10 27 -1 和 10 27 -1 之間。

span.span: Represents a fixed precision and scale numeric value between -10 27 -1 and 10 27 -1 to be stored in or retrieved from a database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得物件，呼叫方法。To obtain an object, call the method. Oracle 數值資料類型可以儲存最多 27 有效位數的十進位數字。Oracle numeric data types can store up to 27 decimal digits of precision. 當 Oracle 數值轉換成 common language runtime 資料類型時，Oracle 值可能太大。When converting Oracle numeric values to common language runtime data types, the Oracle value might be too large. 相反地，當通用語言執行階段資料的數字的值轉換為類型，數字的值可能太大或太高的有效位數。Conversely, when converting a numeric value of a common language runtime data types to an , the numeric value may be either too large or too high precision for the . 任一情況下會造成 Oracle ORA-TUT1-LESSON1-STEP2 22053 溢位錯誤。Either of these cases will cause an Oracle ORA-22053 overflow error. 如果 Oracle 資料庫可能包含大數值，您應該使用資料型別。If your Oracle database might contain large values, you should use the data type. 然後，您可以明確地轉換為通用語言執行階段資料型別和攔截或處理的任何錯誤。You can then convert to the common language runtime data type explicitly, and catch or handle any errors.
